# Government Tender Announcement: Snow Removal Service

**Tender Reference**: PW-22-01004519

**Solicitation Number**: 21301-23-4159492

**Publication Date**: August 17, 2022

**Tender Closing Date**: October 12, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is issuing a Request for Proposals (RFP) bid solicitation for a Snow Removal Service to support the CSC’s operations at the Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines Complex, Quebec.

The contract duration is from November 1st, 2022, to October 31st, 2023, with the option to renew for two (2) additional one-year periods. The snow removal service is required for the main roads, sidewalks, parking lots, and other sectors of the complex.

**Trade Agreement**: This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and the Canada free trade agreements with Chile/Colombia/Honduras/Panama, and the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement.

**Procurement Method**: The procurement method is competitive, open bidding.

To respond to this RFP, all interested suppliers may submit a bid. The bid must comply with the requirements outlined in the RFP document, which can be downloaded from Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders.

**Evaluation Criteria**: The evaluation criteria will be based on the bidder's ability to provide the required snow removal service, as well as their expertise and experience in this area.

**Important Dates**:

* Site visit: September 13, 2022, at 10:00 AM
* Bidder participation confirmation: September 11, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: October 12, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

**Contact Information**:

* Karine Clement, Contracting and Procurement Regional Officer
* Email: [karine.clement@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:karine.clement@csc-scc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 514-235-8177

**Note to Bidders**: Suppliers are advised to review the RFP document carefully and ensure that they meet all the requirements outlined in the document. Suppliers are also advised to participate in the site visit on September 13, 2022, to familiarize themselves with the complex and the snow removal requirements.
